20:18 <sburjan`> has quit

21:10 <@sdumitriu> Hey vmassol  
21:10 <@sdumitriu> I have a naming dilema  
21:11 <@sdumitriu> In the Lucene plugin, there's AbstractIndexData which is kind of a reference/pointer to an entity, like XWikiDocument or XWikiAttachment  
21:12 <@sdumitriu> I'm trying to extract an interface from it, and I don't know how to name it  
21:12 <@sdumitriu> IndexData seems wrong, since it doesn't hold any actual data  
21:12 <@sdumitriu> Do you have any suggestions?  
21:13 <@sdumitriu> IndexEntryReference, IndexEntryMetadata, IndexQueueEntry, EntityReference... None is exactly right  
21:17 <@sdumitriu> The core of the interface is getType, getEntityReference, isDeleted, but there's also addDataToLuceneDocument which invalidates the "reference" name  
21:44 <vmassol> sorry sdumitriu watching a movie with wife right now… it's the ads right now but the movie will start again shortly… ;)  
21:46 <@sdumitriu> No problem  
22:55 <vmassol> ok bed time here…. just rebuilt XE and tried calling a few pages. I find the wiki very slow compared to before. Hope it's just an impression.  
23:00 <vmassol> has quit  
23:03 <mflorea> has quit  
23:16 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki
